titleStmt.title: The Armies declaration examined and compared with their declaration May 6. Their petition and addresse May 12. And their petition and representation. Discovering some of their contradictions, lies, calumnies, hypocrisie, and designes. Well worthy observation.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: A declaration of the General Council of the Officers of the Army: agreed upon at Wallingford-house, 27th Octob. 1659.
The last leaf bears a postscript.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
